name: Animal Transportation Association
goal: We are a non-profit international trade association dedicated to promoting our members and providing access to necessary resources and education for the safe and humane handling and transport of all animals worldwide.
interests: Consumers, Customs, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: ATA has been working with other industry partners in fitness for horses guideline, also in the proces of working together with industry partners on the improvement of way stations.
